definition: newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Anti-Spam feature blocks annoying ad calls and SMSs.
sentences.chinese: 防垃圾邮件功能会阻止恼人的广告电话和手机简讯。

sentences.english: Do you often receive unwamount totd text messaged on your cell phone?
sentences.chinese: 你的手机能否通常收到不想要的简讯？

sentences.english: If you could at least reply a SMS, or leave message n the MSN, and give me a phone call sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你肯至少回一封简讯，给我一个留言，一通电话。

sentences.english: The indictments by text messages are not intended to take people by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 以手机简讯传达起诉书目的并非让人大吃一惊。

sentences.english: Gina almost killed us driving over here, she was DWT.
sentences.chinese: 来的路上吉娜差点害死我们，她边开车边发简讯。

sentences.english: Publish a newsletter that helps people understand what you do and why.
sentences.chinese: 发布简讯，帮助人们了解你们开展的工作及其意义。

sentences.english: John uses his cell phone to send text messaged to his friends.
sentences.chinese: 约翰用手机传简讯给他的友人。

sentences.english: It spans email as well as IM, text messages, and on-Facebook messages.
sentences.chinese: 它涵盖的范围包括即时通，简讯和脸书讯息。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
